traits.name: Hivemind
traits.desc: All wasps within 10 miles of their queen are in constant communication via a telepathic bond.

traits.name: Hive Tactics
traits.desc: The wasp has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the wasp’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Sting
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 1 piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.
